text: This is a list of Hausa people. Only notable individuals are included here. == Actors == * Ali Nuhu * Hadiza Aliyu * Hafsat Idris * Rahama Sadau == Emirs and Sultans == * Abdulmumini Kabir Usman * Daurama * Faruk Umar Faruk * Queen Amina * Muhammad Rumfa * Yaji I * Yunfa == Footballers == *Ahmed Musa *Amadou Moutari *Habib Mohamed *Haruna Babangida *Mohammed Noor *Moussa Maâzou *Omar Hawsawi *Sani Kaita *Shehu Abdullahi *Tijani Babangida *Umar Sadiq == Islamic clerics == * Ahmad Abubakar Gumi * Dahiru Usman Bauchi * Ibrahim Zakzaky * Ja'afar Mahmud Adam * Kabiru Gombe * Muhammad Auwal Albani Zaria * Sani Yahaya Jingir * Abubakar Gumi == Musicians == === Traditional === * Alhaji Mamman Shata * Ali Jita * Dan Maraya Jos * Nazifi Asnanic * Naziru M Ahmad * Nura M Inuwa * Sadiq Zazzabi == Politicians == *Abubakar Tafawa Balewa *Ahmadu Bello Sardauna *Abba Kabir Yusuf *Alhaji Isa Kaita *Aminu Tambuwal *Hadiza Bala Usman *Kabir Tukur Ibrahim *Mahamadou Issoufou *Muhammadu Buhari *Mustapha Baba Shehuri *Rabiu Kwankwaso *Umar Ganduje *Namadi Sambo *Umaru Dikko == Jurist == *Sidi Bage == Businessmen == * Aliko Dangote * Alhassan Dantata *Alhaji Aminu Dantata *Alhaji Isyaku Rabiu *Alhaji Abdulsamad Rabiu *Bashir Dalhatu *A.A rano == Academic == *Attahiru Jega == Military == *Abdulrahman Bello Dambazau *Abdulsalam Abubakar *Ibrahim Babangida *Muhammadu Buhari *Murtala Mohammed == Police == == Writers == * Zaynab Alkali * Abdulbaqi Jari == References == Category:Hausa people Category:Lists of people by ethnicity
title: List of Hausa people
